QuestData.Title: Fuel for the Fire
QuestData.Description: It be time we start our march to Gundrak, mon. It be time for me ta turn ya loose on dem trolls!$b$bDey breached our wall and put a whole army just north of us.$b$bHahaha!$b$bDey be fuel for da fire, mon! We gunna take da chieftiains an' kill da rest! It all be part of my master plan....$b$bYou take dis scepter and go command my abominations. Bring 'em to da Drakkari army and kill em all! When da chieftains come, my pet Shalewing gunna snatch 'em up and bring 'em here to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Drakuru in Voltarus wants you to use the Scepter of Command on Bloated Abominations and then use their abilities at the Frigid Breach to kill 60 Drakkari Skullcrushers and lure out 3 Drakkari Chieftains.$b$bChieftains will appear when enough Skullcrushers have been slain.
QuestData.RewardText: We done it, mon!$b$bI got da chieftains all caged up and you led my abominations to victory over their armies.$b$bIt be time ta celebrate, mon!
